metadata.metaValue: create a point grid by converting a mesh plane to point. set render settings.
Wrap deforms the mesh, points and strands objects.
generate the simple knit, set some colors and render settings.
We first generate a mesh plane to use as the deformer's base_mesh. We then deforms the same mesh to use it as the driver mesh.
Wrap deforms a mesh, points, strands, using a deformed plane.
